definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: The optimization of signal timing is an important way to improve intersection level of service.
sentences.chinese: 信號配時優化是提高平面交叉口服務水平的重要途徑。

sentences.english: And god help the user who clicks on an intersection.
sentences.chinese: 還有，如果用戶點擊交叉口的話，系統也無能爲力。

sentences.english: SIDRA is an efficient tool in designing and evaluating intersection.
sentences.chinese: SIDRA軟件是交叉口設計和評估的工具。

sentences.english: I'll meet you at the intersection of Heping and Roosevelt.
sentences.chinese: 我在和平跟羅斯福路交叉口和你碰面。

sentences.english: In the future, a separation overpass plan would be adopted to resolve the intersection problem totally.
sentences.chinese: 遠期將採用分離式立交方案，徹底解決交叉口問題。

sentences.english: Then, we introduce a single intersection and coordination of the basic theories and methods of control.
sentences.chinese: 其次介紹了單交叉口和協調控制基本理論和方法。

sentences.english: The second way is a methodology for passenger car equivalents at signalized intersections of city.
sentences.chinese: 第二種是關於城市道路交叉口小客車當量換算的方法。

sentences.english: A fashion show at the merge of Broadway and Seventh Avenue showcased the newest trends in intimate apparel.
sentences.chinese: 在百老匯和第七大道的交叉口，一場內衣秀正在上演。

sentences.english: Yes I know the hot dog girl who lives across the lane.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我知道那個在小衚衕的交叉口賣熱狗的女孩。

sentences.english: I will wait fot you in the park at the intersection of two main roads.
sentences.chinese: 我會在兩條主幹道交叉口的街心花園裏等你。

sentences.english: Dynamic optimal control strategies for oversaturated intersections are emphases of this paper.
sentences.chinese: 重點闡述了過飽和交叉口的動態最優控制策略。

sentences.english: Do you know the hot dog girl who lives across the lane?
sentences.chinese: 你知道那個在小衚衕的交叉口賣熱狗的女孩嗎？

sentences.english: Place curved mirrors at hallway intersections or concealed areas.
sentences.chinese: 在走廊交叉口設置凸鏡。

sentences.english: The design of intersection is an important part of highway design.
sentences.chinese: 公路平面交叉口設計是公路設計的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: It is at the intersection of Dongfeng Road and Baita Road.
sentences.chinese: 在東風路和白塔路交叉口。

sentences.english: Do you know the chicken man who lives across the lane ?
sentences.chinese: 你知道那個在小衚衕的交叉口賣烤雞的人嗎？

definition: Jiaokou county in Lüliang 呂梁|吕梁[Lu:3 liang2], Shanxi 山西
the area north of the Great Wall
abbr. for 立體交叉|立体交叉[li4 ti3 jiao1 cha1] overpass
Tianqiao district of Jinan city 濟南市|济南市[Ji3 nan2 shi4], Shandong/Tianqiao district in Beijing, formerly a center of folk culture
